title: Trade Item
description: Defines an item used in a trade, either as input (wants) or output (gives).

fields.title: Item
fields.description: The item identifier, e.g., 'minecraft:emerald' or 'minecraft:coal'. Can include data value suffix like 'minecraft:coal:0'.

fields.title: Quantity
fields.description: Number of this item involved in the trade. Can be a fixed number or an object with min/max for random quantity.

fields.title: Price Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier applied to price increases when supply/demand changes. Higher values mean prices fluctuate more. Typical value is 0.05.

fields.title: Filters
fields.description: Optional filters that must pass for this item to be included in the trade.

fields.title: Functions
fields.description: Array of functions to apply to the trade item, such as enchantments. This property was deprecated and removed in newer versions of trade tables.
fields.note: The functions property was available in versions 1.16 through 1.18 but has been removed. Use standard item properties instead.

fields.title: Choice
fields.description: Alternative items that can be traded. This property was deprecated and removed in newer versions of trade tables.
fields.note: The choice property was available in versions 1.16 through 1.18 but has been removed.

fields.title: filters
fields.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

subForm.title: Filters
subForm.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.
